data.title: My favorite Mexican restaraunt in a town full of Mexican options
data.text: When friends and family visit from out of town, Toluca is where I take them - and they never fail to impress.  They make the best Fajitas in town, they never fail to impress.  I have tried about 1/2 of the menu over the years, and I have never had a meal I did not like - I just like some more than others.  Service is always great.  The atmosphere is very family friendly.  Simple touches like hand pressed fresh tortillas take it right over the top for me.

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: While visiting family, they recommended this restaurant and it did not disappoint. You are given three different salsas that are all good. The prices were great, especially considering the portion size. They even had sweet tea! We will definitely go back the next time we are visiting family.

data.title: We liked the food!!
data.text: I read the other review and was really surprised.  We have been here several times and the place has always been pretty good.  Good prices and lots of food AND it tastes good--not gourmet--but good Mexican food.

data.title: terrible service and canned food for ridiclulous prices :(
data.text: i love waukegan for mexican food, but this place disjointed us. to start, the menus were gross and full of the last person's food (GROSS!!) which tottaly runined my appetite, second the waitress was slightly rude and only came to take our drink and food order and the check! i was expecting some sort of hospitality...none to be found here. the bathrooms "reaked" acording to my daughter and the food would have been better if i went to the market and bought the cans myself. i can tell the difference. What really made me irk was the terrible ambiance...full of drunks that looked like "food" was not the only indistinguishable item they came here to buy. NOT A FAMILY FRIENDLY ATMOSPHERE!!!!!
